# setFont(_:range:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the font of characters within `aRange` to `aFont`.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setFont(_ font: NSFont, range: NSRange)
```

## Discussion

This method applies only to a rich text object.

This method does not include undo support by default. Clients must invoke [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextView/shouldChangeText(inRanges:replacementStrings:)] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextView/shouldChangeText(in:replacementString:)] to include this method in an undoable action.

## Changing the font

- **changeFont(_:)**: This action method changes the font of the selection for a rich text object, or of all text for a plain text object.
- **font**: The font of all the receiver’s text.
